tutorials.heroDescription: Learn to master Rainbow step by step with our comprehensive guides and detailed tutorials.

tut1.title: Getting started with Rainbow
tut1.description: Discover how to create your account, customize your profile and send your first message with Rainbow. A complete guide to get started.

tut2.title: Set up your workspace
tut2.description: Learn how to configure your Rainbow workspace: communication channels, groups, notifications and team preferences.

tut3.title: Manage your users
tut3.description: Complete guide to user management: invitations, roles and permissions, team groups and administration settings.

tut4.title: CRM Integrations
tut4.description: Connect Rainbow to your favorite CRM tools: Salesforce, HubSpot, Microsoft Dynamics. Sync your contacts and call history.

tut5.title: Advanced video conferencing
tut5.description: Master advanced video conferencing features: screen sharing, recording, virtual meeting rooms and webinars.

tut6.title: API & Developer SDK
tut6.description: Explore the Rainbow API and available SDKs to integrate communication into your applications: authentication, webhooks, bots and more.

tutorials.resourcesDescription: Our support team is available to answer all your questions and help you get started with Rainbow.

about.title: About Alcatel-Lucent Enterprise
about.heroDescription: For over 100 years, Alcatel-Lucent Enterprise has been at the forefront of communication innovation, helping businesses worldwide connect, collaborate and grow.
about.storyP1: Alcatel-Lucent Enterprise (ALE) is a leading provider of communications, networking and cloud solutions tailored to customers' industries. With innovative technology and a deep understanding of business needs, ALE delivers solutions that connect people and things, processes and knowledge.
about.storyP2: Rainbow by ALE is the next-generation cloud communication platform that brings together messaging, video conferencing, telephony, and collaboration into a single, unified experience for businesses of all sizes.
about.val1Desc: We continuously push the boundaries of communication technology to deliver cutting-edge solutions.
about.val2Desc: Every decision we make is guided by the needs of our customers and their success.
about.val3Desc: We are committed to reducing our environmental footprint and building a sustainable future.
about.val4Desc: We ensure the highest standards of data protection, privacy and security for all our solutions.
about.ctaDescription: Discover how Rainbow can help your business collaborate better.

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.publisherContent: This website is published by ALE International, a company incorporated under the laws of France.
legal.directorContent: The publication director is the legal representative of ALE International.
legal.hostingContent: This website is hosted by Railway Corporation, 548 Market Street, San Francisco, CA 94104, United States.
legal.ipContent: All content on this website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, software and trademarks, is the property of ALE International or its licensors and is protected by applicable intellectual property laws. Any reproduction, distribution or modification without prior written consent is prohibited.
legal.liabilityContent: ALE International makes every effort to ensure the accuracy of the information published on this website but cannot guarantee that it is complete, accurate or up to date. ALE International shall not be held liable for any direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of this website.
legal.linksContent: This website may contain links to third-party websites. ALE International has no control over the content of these sites and accepts no responsibility for them.
legal.lawContent: This legal notice is governed by French law. Any dispute relating to the use of this website shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Nanterre, France.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introContent: ALE International ("we", "us", "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store and share your personal data when you use the Rainbow platform and this website.
privacy.controllerContent: The data controller is ALE International, 32 avenue Kléber, 92700 Colombes, France. For any questions regarding your personal data, contact us at: privacy@al-enterprise.com.
privacy.collectionContent: We collect the following categories of personal data:
privacy.collectionItems: Account information (name, email, company, phone); Usage data (login times, features used, preferences); Payment data (processed securely by Stripe — we do not store card numbers); Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information); Communication data (support tickets, contact form submissions)
privacy.purposeContent: We process your personal data for the following purposes:
privacy.purposeItems: Providing and improving our services; Managing your account and subscriptions; Processing payments; Sending service-related communications; Providing customer support; Complying with legal obligations; Analyzing usage to improve our platform
privacy.legalBasisContent: We process your data based on: contract performance (to provide our services), legitimate interest (to improve our platform and prevent fraud), consent (for marketing communications), and legal obligation (tax and accounting requirements).
privacy.sharingContent: We may share your data with: Stripe (payment processing), Brevo (email communications), Railway (hosting infrastructure), and other service providers necessary for operating our platform. We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
privacy.retentionContent: We retain your personal data for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide our services. After account deletion, we may retain certain data for up to 5 years to comply with legal obligations.
privacy.rightsContent: Under the GDPR, you have the right to:
privacy.rightsItems: Access your personal data; Rectify inaccurate data; Erase your data ("right to be forgotten"); Restrict processing; Data portability; Object to processing; Withdraw consent at any time
privacy.rightsContact: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at privacy@al-enterprise.com.
privacy.cookiesContent: We use essential cookies to ensure the proper functioning of our website (language preference, authentication session). We do not use advertising or tracking cookies.
privacy.securityContent: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data, including encryption in transit (TLS), secure password hashing, and regular security reviews.
privacy.changesContent: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting a notice on our website or sending you an email.
privacy.contactContent: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your data protection rights, contact us at:
